data.eml:eml: Stoneflies of the genus Neoperla (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from Wuyi Mountain National Nature Reserve, Fujian of China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qin, Xue-Feng, Muranyi, David, Wang, Guo-Quan, Li, Wei-Hai (2013): Stoneflies of the genus Neoperla (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from Wuyi Mountain National Nature Reserve, Fujian of China. ZooKeys 326: 1-16, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.326.5911, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.326.5911
